headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Head to Pedal and Metal Cycles on your iFruit for an absolute steal this week — all bicycles are free. Aspiring bikers can pick up any MC Clubhouse property (and upgrade it to their heart’s content) for 40% off. Plus, there are also sales on a range of four-wheeled vehicles, if that’s more your speed.

- Vulcar Warrener HKR – 30% off
- Shitzu Hakuchou Drag – 40% off
- Pegassi Vortex – 40% off
- MTL Dune – 40% off

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details!
